title.narrative: Research advisory services for the strenghtening of the HRBA in private sector support

description.narrative: Consultancy and research services are provided by Shift (Shift ltd) the leading Centre of Expertise on the UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights. The aim is to strengthen the human rights bases approach of private sector instruments and progra ms supported by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and or other public funding. The project involves the procurement of expert services (consultancy and research services) in human rights and business including training for all stakeholders and tailor-made su pport services for each of the private sector instruments to strengthen human rights (Beam / Business Finland Finnpartnership PIF Finnfund and Finnvera). In addition training tools / surveys are being produced to support companies and the Finnish Governmen t in their efforts on human rights due diligence human rights training and reporting. Further Finland supports the Valuing Respect project to enhance measuring of campanies human rights impacts. The value of the procurement is 558600 ?. The contract perio d is 3 years from 2019 to 2021.
